nameField.label: Keychain name
nameField.infoLabel: Helps you distinguish it from others. Min 5 characters, max 60 characters

tabs.ariaLabel: Two different tabs for keychain members and public keys

addUsersToKeychainDrawer.title: Add members to keychain

nameInput.label: Key name (required)
nameInput.infoLabel: This will help you distinguish it from others. Min. 5 characters, max. 60 characters

userKeysLink.label: Go to the list of keys associated with the user

removeFromKeychain.tooltip: Operation allowed only for users with administrator permissions

delete.label: Delete
delete.tooltip: Operation allowed only for users with administrator permissions

publicKey.orphanKeyAlertLabel: The user who uploaded this key is no longer part of this keychain. It is recommended to replace the key with a new one. For more information, <1>read the guide.</1>

list.userEnableInfo: To upload a key, you must first add yourself as a user in the «Keychain members» tab
list.publicKeyLimitInfo: You have reached the maximum number of keys for this keychain
